00061 #ifndef __STDUMMYTREE_H
00062 #define __STDUMMYTREE_H
00063 
00064 #include <math.h>
00065 #include <arboretum/stCommon.h>
00066 #include <arboretum/stTypes.h>
00067 #include <arboretum/stMetricTree.h>
00068 #include <arboretum/stDummyNode.h>
00069 
00070 
00092 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
00093 class stDummyTree: public stMetricTree<ObjectType, EvaluatorType>{
00094    public:
00098       typedef ObjectType tObject;
00099 
00104       typedef EvaluatorType tMetricEvaluator;
00105 
00109       typedef stResult <ObjectType> tResult;
00110 
00116       stDummyTree(stPageManager * pageman);
00117 
00121       virtual ~stDummyTree(){
00122 
00123          if (HeaderPage != NULL){
00124             // Release the header page.
00125             myPageManager->ReleasePage(HeaderPage);
00126          }//end if
00127       }//end ~stDummyTree
00128 
00136       virtual bool Add(tObject * obj);
00137 
00141       virtual long GetNumberOfObjects(){
00142          return Header->ObjectCount;
00143       }//end GetNumberOfObjects
00144 
00148       virtual long GetNodeCount(){
00149          return Header->NodeCount;
00150       }//end GetNodeCount
00151 
00155       virtual stCount GetMaxOccupation(){
00156          return Header->MaxOccupation;
00157       }//end GetMaxOccupation
00158 
00162       void SetMaxOccupation(stCount newValue){
00163          if (newValue > Header->MaxOccupation){
00164             Header->MaxOccupation = newValue;
00165          }//end if
00166       }//end SetMaxOccupation
00167 
00177       virtual tResult * RangeQuery(tObject * sample, stDistance range);
00178 
00189       virtual tResult * ReversedRangeQuery(tObject * sample, stDistance range);
00190 
00200       virtual tResult * NearestQuery(tObject * sample, stCount k, bool tie = false);
00201 
00211       virtual tResult * FarthestQuery(tObject * sample, stCount k, bool tie = false);
00212 
00227       virtual tResult * KAndRangeQuery(tObject * sample, stDistance range,
00228             stCount k, bool tie=false);
00229 
00244       virtual tResult * KOrRangeQuery(tObject * sample, stDistance range,
00245             stCount k, bool tie=false);
00246 
00262       virtual tResult * RingQuery(tObject * sample, stDistance inRange,
00263             stDistance outRange);
00264 
00276       tResult * SumRangeQuery(tObject ** samplelist, stSize samplesize, stDistance range);
00277 
00288       tResult * SumNearestQuery(tObject ** samplelist, stSize samplesize, stCount k, bool tie = false);
00289 
00300       tResult * NearestJoinQuery(stDummyTree * joinedtree, stCount k, bool tie = false);
00301 
00311       tResult * RangeJoinQuery(stDummyTree * joinedtree, stDistance range);
00312 
00313    private:
00317       typedef struct DummyTreeHeader{
00321          stPageID Root;
00322 
00326          stSize ObjectCount;
00327 
00331          stSize NodeCount;
00332 
00336          stCount MaxOccupation;
00337       } stDummyTreeHeader;
00338 
00343       stPage * HeaderPage;
00344 
00348       stDummyTreeHeader * Header;
00349 
00353       bool HeaderUpdate;
00354 
00358       void Create(){
00359 
00360          LoadHeader();
00361          Header->Root = 0;
00362          Header->ObjectCount = 0;
00363          Header->NodeCount = 0;
00364          Header->MaxOccupation = 0;
00365          HeaderUpdate = true;
00366          WriteHeader();
00367       }//end Create
00368 
00372       void LoadHeader(){
00373          HeaderPage = myPageManager->GetHeaderPage();
00374          Header = (stDummyTreeHeader *) HeaderPage->GetData();
00375       }//end LoadHeader
00376 
00380       void WriteHeader(){
00381          if (HeaderUpdate){
00382             myPageManager->WriteHeaderPage(HeaderPage);
00383             HeaderUpdate = false;
00384          }//end if
00385       }//end WriteHeader
00386 
00390       void UpdateObjectCounter(int inc){
00391          Header->ObjectCount += inc;
00392          HeaderUpdate = true;
00393       }//end UpdateObjectCounter
00394 
00395 };//end stDummyTree
00396 
00397 #include <arboretum/stDummyTree.cc>
00398 #endif //__STDUMMYTREE_H
